  • The Duality of Thought

    09 May 2012

    Thinking, truly thinking, is a dangerously beautiful thing. It’s as much as a blessing as it is a burden and it’s hard to explain. The American Dream is to do well in school, go to college, do well in college, get a good job, marry, have kids, retire, die. Isn’t it strange that we can generalize a dream? Does that even make sense? Here we are, a nation of 300 million individuals, and society says the path each one of...
